item.title: Understand your website visitors with live web stats with GoSquared
item.description: I just started to use GoSquared this week - If you’ve got a high traffic website (well any website really) and want some real-time web analytics or insights - then you better get started with a FREE GoSquared account today. Using GoSquared I can watch as visitors come and go. Free Web Analytics & insights Â GoSquared monitors and analyses your website’s traffic in real-time - and you can watch all the action in the LiveStats console - which is like a 3 part Heads-Up Display.
